author: Steven Jiang, CNN
title: Chinese Americans on the forefront of advocating wearing masks in public
description: Like many Americans across the country, Wenqiong Xue has been fanatically making face masks for two weeks, using ripped bedsheets and a sewing machine that she dusted off from a closet in her Boston area house.
content:
(CNN)Like many Americans across the country, Wenqiong Xue has been fanatically making face masks for two weeks, using ripped bedsheets and a sewing machine that she dusted off from a closet in her Boston area house.
But the homemaker in Medfield, Massachuset… [+2110 chars]
